data.title: A Crash Course in Miracles: Episode 5 Return of the Red Donut
data.text:
And so we start another red donut 창??Welcome to episode 5 from All That Matters, the largest yoga and holistic health services center in Southern New England. We recorded 3 sessions here. If you have listened to the 1st 4 episodes you probably have an idea already what the barrier of fear is, we also call it the red donut, the story of me, and sometimes just 창??in here.창?? (Imagine me pointing to it.) If this is your first episode, try enlarging the picture in the I tunes window or simply go to Cloud Sun dot com and see the graphics there.

You probably have noticed that we always open these with some preview quotes, all patched together, so you can get a taste of what the discussion is like. We창??ll play the previews now and jump right into the discussion. Well this one leans more toward presentation. I do travel and make this presentation to groups. Let me know if you are interested. Philip@Urso.com
